abstract: The patient was a 59-year-old woman. We performed chemotherapy using S-1 after resection of sigmoid carcinoma because the patient was diagnosed with metastatic lung tumor. The mass was regarded as metastases and reduced in size. We performed pulmonary segmentectomy. Frozen section pathological diagnosis revealed that it was primary lung cancer.
title: [Primary lung cancer that I was preoperative and needed discrimination for and one example of the repetition cancer of the colon].
